Articles.Content: Seriously, the game has changed so much since then, or even 0.21, when I joined. Has anyone been actively playing some 0.7.3?

You can see the initial announcement thread on the Orbiter forums [here](http://orbiter-forum.com/showthread.php?t=22998). (Harv updates the OP with every release, but the subsequent posts are all from 4 years ago.) Many of those people posting about trying out that first release are still playing it today.

0.7.3 was my first experience with KSP. It was recommended in another game's forum and members were competing for the highest altitude straight up. I played around with it for an hour and forgot about it. I picked it up again a few versions later when it was much more playable and kept up with it since.

Oh man did I ever read that wrong. I swear you were asking if the game HAD changed since then.... I couldn't wrap my brain around anyone asking that....

Think I need sleep, I kerballed all day.

I joined up around 0.10, so no. Though of the active forum members, a few definitely have. I'm pretty sure Kryten started with the first version, and he's a regular over in The Science Labs forum even now.
I'm not that active, but I did start around version 0.8.5.
I started with 0.8.something, but then didn't start playing regularly until .14ish maybe
